content: <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/"                        xmlns:opensearchgeo="http://a9.com/-/opensearch/extensions/geo/1.0/">    <ShortName>GeoNames</ShortName>    <Description>geographical search engine</Description>    <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon">http://www.geonames.org/geonames.ico</Image>    <Url type="text/html" template="http://www.geonames.org/search.html?q={searchTerms}&BBOX={opensearchgeo:box?}"></Url>    <Query role="example" searchTerms="London" />    <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>    <Language>en</Language>    <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>    <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding> </OpenSearchDescription>
